eu.wauz.wauzcore.players

Class WauzPlayerDataSectionSkills

  • java.lang.Object
    • eu.wauz.wauzcore.players.WauzPlayerDataSectionSkills

  • public class WauzPlayerDataSectionSkills
extends java.lang.Object
    A section of the player data for storing skill data.
    Author:
    Wauzmons
    See Also:
    WauzPlayerData

      • isSkillReady

        public boolean isSkillReady(java.lang.String skillId)
        Checks if the cooldown timestamp for the given skill is smaller than the current time.
        Parameters:
        skillId - The id of the skill.
        Returns:
        If the cooldown is ready.

      • updateSkillCooldown

        public void updateSkillCooldown(java.lang.String skillId)
        Resets the cooldown for the given skill. Only one second if the player has magic debug permissions.
        Parameters:
        skillId - The id of the skill.
        See Also:
        WauzDebugger.toggleMagicDebugMode(Player)

        Returns:
        If the cooldown is ready.

        Parameters:

        cooldown - The food cooldown in seconds.
